)LHOG+RXVHXQLWYHQWVHQJLQHHULQJDWWKH)OHWFKHU0D\QDUG$FDGHP\DQG/RQJIHOORZEXLOGLQJ

TO BE ADOPTED ON OR AFTER MAY 24, 2021

May 17, 2021

 $FRPPXQLFDWLRQWUDQVPLWWHGIURP/RXLV$'H3DVTXDOH&LW\0DQDJHUUHODWLYHWRDQRUGHU



YEAS:

0DOORQ&RXQFLOORU0F*RYHUQ0D\RU6LGGLTXL&RXQFLOORU6LPPRQV&RXQFLOORU
7RRPH\&RXQFLOORU=RQGHUYDQ


 'HDWKRI-HQQD6DQWRV
 Mayor Siddiqui, Councillor Toomey and entire membership.
RES 2021 #128
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
